reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 103/20: REVOCATION OF WATER TAKING PERMITS

content.content: 1. A permit issued under section 34.1 of the Act for the purpose of operating a dam that is associated with the production of electricity is deemed to be revoked on March 30, 2020.
content.raw_html: 1. A permit issued under section 34.1 of the Act for the purpose of operating a dam that is associated with the production of electricity is deemed to be revoked on March 30, 2020.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
